{{title}}

        <!--This is your HTML Template for this Table-->
        <rx-data-table
           column-configuration="dtConfig"
           list-of-data="dtData"
        </rx-data-table>

The Data on the Controller Should look like:

$scope.dtConfig = {{ dtConfig | JSONPrint }};

// This is generated via a function
$scope.dtData = {{ dtData | JSONPrint }};
